timeline.era: Collapse of the Era of the Globe

events.title: Fall of the Global Concord
events.text: The last remnants of the Era of the Globe fracture under resource wars and ideological schisms.

events.title: Fragmentation of the Continental Councils
events.text: Once‑cooperative councils turn inward, hoarding archives and weaponry.

commonwealth.name: The Commonwealth
commonwealth.summary: A revolutionary republic born from the Montague uprisings.
commonwealth.politics: Layered assemblies and a powerful security apparatus.
commonwealth.culture: Pamphlets, civic festivals, and the Urban Tithe.
commonwealth.conflicts: Cold War with Ryenarkia and proxy struggles.

factions.name: Revolutionary Commonwealth of Montague
factions.tagline: The idea that the governed may govern.
factions.symbol: A broken chain encircling a ballot.

culture.name: Montague’s Pamphlets
culture.description: Cheaply printed leaflets arguing for civic sovereignty.

characters.name: Darwues the Emperor
characters.description: A commander crowned under Halphadite prophecy.
characters.notes: Official chronicles present him as inevitable.

encyclopedia.text: A mandatory levy on city dwellers.
